description: Jan Hein Hoogstad, alias Yeehaa, is a professional skilled in ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and strategic alignment. He authored 'Align the Misaligned' and 'Continental Drift,' and curated a course on aligning goals through SWOT analysis.
blurb: Jan Hein Hoogstad, also known as Yeehaa, is a skilled professional renowned for his expertise in ecosystem architecture, tech design, and strategic alignment.
